skills.name: Invokation of Propagation
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127021]</color> and place them randomly into your deck. After you summon 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127022]</color>, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127027]</color> and obtains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K6]</color> points.

After you summon 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Proliferated Organism</color>, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Reignited Heart of Oasis</color> and obtains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color></color> points.
skills.description: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 Awaken, My Kindred and place them randomly into your deck. After you summon 4 Proliferated Organism, this character gains Reignited Heart of Oasis and obtains 2 Shield points.
